Job.Description: She will help keep Crossgate safe.

GainTrait.Text: She has become pretty Tough from all the fights she's been in.
She is getting rather Aggressive from her enjoyment of combat.
Chasing after thieves and muggers, ${name} has gotten quite fast.
${name} has been patrolling the streets of Crossgate for so long, she now considers herself a City Girl.

LoseTrait.Text: ${name} has had to heal from so many injuries you can't say she is Fragile anymore.
Having to use her authority in the City Guard, ${name} has become less Meek.

GainTrait.Text: Being a city guard, ${name} started to get used to abusing her authority. (+Audacity)

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to guard the city during the ${shift}.

Message.Name: event.caught-thief.easy
Message.Text: ${name} spotted a thief and was on him before he could blink, putting a stop to the theft.
${name} spotted a thief and was on her before she could get away. She is quick.

Message.Name: event.caught-thief.hard
Message.Text: ${name} spotted a thief. She was able to keep up, and managed to catch her.
${name} spotted a thief. Luckily, he wasn't a good runner, so even someone as slow as ${name} could keep up, managing to catch him.

Message.Name: event.lost-thief
Message.Text: ${name} spotted a thief. As so as he saw here, he took of running. ${name} was able to chase him for a few minutes, but he ended up giving her the slip in the end.
${name} spotted a thief. "Stop, you're under arrest", she calls out. The thief takes off, and after a rather short chase ${name} is left wheezing, having lost sight of her quarry.
